name: MaliceTakesOver
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD: Move.
SPACEBAR: Jump.
LMB: Shoot.
i: open inventory.

Demo gameplay: Right now you can explore, Defeat enemies, collect the runestones they drop, and equip the runestones in your wand from the inventory.

Demo of an adventure game inspired by little witch academia. You play as Malice, the antagonist and the main character, following her as she tries to take over the peaceful region of Emeraldpointe. 

Still very much a work in progress. Feedback and critiques appreciated.
